newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - PeopleSoft raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - PeopleSoft raised to buy.

text.p: -- Smith Barney upgraded its rating for PeopleSoft Inc Wednesday to buy from outperform, a source at the brokerage said.
-- Shares in the company closed Tuesday at 35.
-- The analysts both said the upgrades were based primarily on the company's report of strong first quarter results last night.
-- The company said it earned $0.14 per share in the period versus $0.08 one year ago and above Brown Bros' $0.12 per share estimate and the $0.13 per share forecast by First Albany.
-- Revenues soared to $153.7 million from $82.3 million.

-- According to Scocozza, the company's shares are "trading near a 52-week low primarily due to general weakness in the technology sector. With clear momentum in the packaged application market, we expect PSFT to trade at a slight premium to its earings growth rate. Our short-term price target is $44 and long-term price target is $60."
